title: *6 WEEKS FREE* Expertly Crafted Property w/ downright AMAZING views!!
posting_body: Please do your self a favor and view this brand spanking new luxury apartment overlooking all of downtown and Lady Bird Lake.
By far the best view I have seen of our beautiful city.
They even have a rooftop bar that is manned by a expert bartender crafting your favorite cocktails every night after 5pm!
You never have to leave your home with their 24 hour fully equipped fitness center, infinity edge pool, outdoor lounge and private rooftop dinning room.
Walk out your front door and have direct access to Lady Bird Lake hike and bike trails, The Long Center and Auditorium Shores.
You are in walking distance to everything you need!
Call me today and let's go check it out!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
